title: Penguin Girl
alternative_title: Penguin Musume♥Heart, ペンギン娘♥はぁと
description: Sakura Nankyoku is a total otaku. Due to a fluke, she gets elected as her class’ Student Council President. Everything takes off from there into a series of crazy misadventures revolving around Sakura, her family, and her classmates.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
